definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: jian3 dan1 wang3 luo4 guan3 li3 xie2 yi4
wang3 luo4 guan3 li3 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Network tolling is the important part of network administration.
sentences.chinese: 網絡收費是網絡管理的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: BPDU and network management messages are processed.
sentences.chinese: BPDU和網絡管理消息仍將被處理。

sentences.english: Application-layer traffic identification and control is the precondition of network billing and management.
sentences.chinese: 應用層流量識別及控制是網絡計費和網絡管理的前提。

sentences.english: Security management is one of the 5 functional areas, i. e. , FCAPS, of OSI network management.
sentences.chinese: 安全管理是OSI網絡管理五大功能域之一。

sentences.english: This system is applied to network management for booth in the city.
sentences.chinese: 該系統適用於城市公用電話自動計費器的網絡管理。

sentences.english: Network management is an important support of power communication network.
sentences.chinese: 網絡管理是電力通信網的重要支撐。

sentences.english: These indicators are the minimum cut sets in probabilistic risk assessment and network management.
sentences.chinese: 這些指標是風險概率評估和網絡管理的最小割集。

sentences.english: Click the NetworkManager icon in the system notification area.
sentences.chinese: 在系統通知區點擊網絡管理圖標。

sentences.english: We will intensify our information security and secrecy, and improve management of information networks.
sentences.chinese: 加強信息安全和保密工作，完善信息網絡管理。

sentences.english: Effecient network management is becoming more and more important as networks getting complicated.
sentences.chinese: 隨着網絡的日趨複雜，有效的網絡管理越來越重要。

sentences.english: A network management important development tendency is develops to the intellectualized direction.
sentences.chinese: 網絡管理的一個重要發展趨勢是向智能化方向發展。
